title: Roos Park Restaurant Website
description: Full-stack restaurant platform featuring AI-driven menu suggestions and smart ordering. Includes real-time table booking, WhatsApp integration, and a comprehensive admin dashboard.

title: Employee Management System
description: Comprehensive workforce management system featuring secure authentication, bulk data processing (Excel/CSV), and an interactive analytics dashboard.

title: Android Auth App
description: Modern Material 3 Android application implementing secure authentication flows, including Google Sign-In and Firebase backend integration.

title: Phone Inventory System
description: Real-time inventory tracking system with secure JWT authentication, dynamic product management, and instant search capabilities.

title: AI Career Guidance App
description: Bilingual AI career counselor powered by LLaMA, providing personalized professional guidance in Gujarati and English.

title: Windows Forms CAD Automation
description: Desktop automation tool for SolidWorks, streamlining CAD workflows with custom UserControls and local SQLite data management.

title: Order Management System
description: Scalable industrial workflow system designed to optimize order processing and tracking using a React and Node.js architecture.

title: AI Portfolio Assistant
description: Interactive portfolio assistant powered by OpenAI, allowing visitors to converse with a virtual representation of my professional profile.
